entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 25 March 2023
